name: Hostbip Notifications
description: Sends custom notifications to users using different SMS and WhatsApp gateways.
author: Hostbip Limited

api_provider.Description: Select the gateway to send notifications (SMS or WhatsApp).

api_key.Description: Enter the API key for the selected provider.

api_secret.Description: Enter the API secret for the selected provider.

sender_id.Description: The name or number that appears as the sender, depending on the SMS provider.

zender_api_url.Description: Enter the Zender API URL for sending SMS or WhatsApp messages.

zender_mode.Description: Select the Zender mode (devices or credits).

zender_device.Description: Enter the Zender device ID to be used (for devices mode).

zender_sim.Description: Enter the Zender SIM ID to be used (for devices with multiple SIMs).

custom_http_url.Description: Enter the URL for the custom HTTP SMS gateway.

custom_http_parameters.Description: Define additional parameters for the custom HTTP gateway in key=value format.

custom_message_client_signup.Description: Custom notification message for client signup. Use placeholders like {firstname}, {lastname}, {email}.

custom_message_invoice_creation.Description: Custom notification message for invoice creation. Use placeholders like {invoiceid}, {invoicedate}, {amount}.

custom_message_invoice_paid.Description: Custom notification message for invoice paid. Use placeholders like {invoiceid}, {amount}, {invoicedate}.

custom_message_service_activation.Description: Custom notification message for service activation. Use placeholders like {domain}, {registrationdate}, {nextduedate}.

custom_message_client_login.Description: Custom notification message for client login. Use placeholders like {firstname}, {lastname}.

custom_message_domain_registration.Description: Custom notification message for domain registration. Use placeholders like {domain}, {registrationdate}, {expirydate}.

custom_message_domain_expiring.Description: Custom notification message for domain expiring. Use placeholders like {domain}, {expirydate}.

custom_message_domain_expired.Description: Custom notification message for domain expired. Use placeholders like {domain}, {expirydate}.

notify_client_signup.Description: Enable or disable notification when a new client registers.

notify_invoice_creation.Description: Enable or disable notification when a new invoice is created.

notify_invoice_paid.Description: Enable or disable notification when an invoice is paid.

notify_service_activation.Description: Enable or disable notification when a service is activated.

notify_client_login.Description: Enable or disable notification when a client logs in.

notify_domain_registration.Description: Enable or disable notification when a domain is registered.

notify_domain_expiring.Description: Enable or disable notification when a domain is expiring.

notify_domain_expired.Description: Enable or disable notification when a domain expires.
